rukus.text: Dájúdájú Àwa sọ al-Ƙur’ān kalẹ̀ nínú Òru Abiyì
Kí sì ni ó mú ọ mọ ohun t’ó ń jẹ́ Òru Abiyì
Òru Abiyì lóore ju ẹgbẹ̀rún oṣù lọ
Àwọn mọlāika àti Jibrīl yó sì máa sọ̀kalẹ̀ nínú òru náà pẹ̀lú àṣẹ Olúwa wọn fún gbogbo ọ̀rọ̀ ẹ̀dá kọ̀ọ̀kan
Àlàáfíà ni òru náà títí di àsìkò àfẹ̀mọ́júmọ́
